message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $150. It's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $80 is a bit too low, I could meet you halfway at $125. This item is truly worth it!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can we meet at $90?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. Let's make this work - $110 and it's yours!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $105. Is this a deal?
